name: @peckhamcc/lambda-shop-payments-create
description: Create a payment for an order with square
author: Alex Potsides

scripts.build: cp ../config/index.js config.js && cp ../lambda-lib/square-client.js square-client.js && cp ../lambda-lib/account.js account.js && cp ../lambda-lib/middleware.js middleware.js && cp ../lambda-lib/email.js email.js
scripts.build:dev: cp ../config/index.js config.js && cp ../lambda-lib/square-client.js square-client.js && cp ../lambda-lib/dev-account.js account.js && cp ../lambda-lib/middleware.js middleware.js && cp ../lambda-lib/dev-email.js email.js
